name: ISSEN
headline: AI realtime voice companion for language learning
description: ISSEN is an AI conversational language app that helps you become fluent. Your on-demand voice tutor is personal to you, adapting lessons and chats to your particular interests, learning style, and goals. Our mission is to transform language learning by offering a level of connection, effectiveness and fun that, until now, only human teachers could provide.

founders.name: Anton Apostolatos, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Issen. Ex-Palantir (Chief Architect of Infra / Head of Palantir LATAM). Stanford AI.

founders.name: Mariano Sorgente, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of issen, your AI foreign language tutor.  
Experienced in crypto and AI, in engineering and VC.
Previously a16z.

# Master a foreign language with your personal AI tutor
### ISSEN is a realtime voice tutor that adapts toyour particular interests, learning style, and goals

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2vhAQQLpWlI206uoDycYkA45jw.svg)
### Conversational
Engage in natural back-and-forth dialogue that builds fluency. Your tutor is multilingual, understanding and speaking both your native language and the language you‚Äôre learning on the app.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lmUiFbZ05DxwJo5zfbfiCZ0GlM.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lmUiFbZ05DxwJo5zfbfiCZ0GlM.svg)
### Flexible Learning Structure
From diving into focused grammar lessons to having a casual conversation about your day, your tutor adapts to your interests and understands your learning style over time.
From diving into focused grammar lessons to having a casual conversation about your day, your tutor adapts to your interests and understands your learning style over time.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZuBUR4e5yfPPvc7fBPVMxoon7M.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZuBUR4e5yfPPvc7fBPVMxoon7M.svg)
### Personal and On-Demand
You can learn wherever you are. Traveling or at home? Your tutor is available 24/7, tailoring every session to your needs and schedule. 
### Become fluent with ISSEN
## Immersion is the path to fluency.
### Conversation plays a proven role in language learning, offering learners a real space to engage, receive feedback, and improve their speaking skills through active practice.

### Karen D.
Learning English
"I practice every day and it‚Äôs been very useful for me. I really like that there‚Äôs the option to quickly start a conversation with a particular topic and get the lesson going. The grammar lessons are excellent and very helpful too.
I‚Äôm really enjoying ISSEN!"
"I practice every day and it‚Äôs been very useful for me. I really like that there‚Äôs the option to quickly start a conversation with a particular topic and get the lesson going. The grammar lessons are excellent and very helpful too.
I‚Äôm really enjoying ISSEN!"
### Maria A.
Learning Italian
"I‚Äôm so glad I‚Äôve started using ISSEN. I‚Äôve been wanting to learn Italian for years, but was never able to find the time for it. The conversations with the tutors are great (so lifelike I often forget I‚Äôm not talking with a real person) and I don‚Äôt have the stress of having to go to an appointment. I love the fact that you can set your tutor‚Äôs speed and patience levels, that really allows you to steer the conversations to wherever you feel most comfortable. Grazie mille, ISSEN!"
### Matt L.
Learning Mandarin Chinese
"ISSEN has been a real game changer for my self-study. The choice to switch between different tutors keeps things fresh and in just a couple of weeks I've found my ability to start and manage conversations in my target language in real life has improved significantly. I strongly recommend anyone who is not living in a location surrounded by their TL to give this a shot!"
ISSEN has been a real game changer for my self-study. The choice to switch between different tutors keeps things fresh and in just a couple of weeks I've found my ability to start and manage conversations in my target language in real life has improved significantly. I strongly recommend anyone who is not living in a location surrounded by their TL to give this a shot!
### Learn More
## Frequently Asked Questions
What languages can I learn with ISSEN?
You can use ISSEN to practice and learn Afrikaans, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Belarusian, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Cantonese, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Galician, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Mandarin Chinese, Maori, Marathi, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, and Welsh.
How is ISSEN better than other language learning apps?
We set out to redefine what a language learning app can be‚Äînot by building on existing solutions, but by starting with the experience of a human tutor.
ISSEN is a true language tutor, accessible anytime from your computer or phone. Conversations can be as structured or open-ended as you like‚Äîdive into focused grammar lessons or have a casual chat about your day. Over time, you build a relationship with your AI tutor, which means that as they get to know you, they tailor conversations and lesson plans to your needs‚Äìbut will never judge you when you make a mistake! Plus, our AI tutors are deeply multi-lingual, so if you are a Danish/Mandarin Chinese native looking to learn Gujarati, ISSEN is the app for you.
Our mission is to transform language learning by delivering the connection, effectiveness, and fun that, until now, only human teachers could offer.
How can I start using ISSEN?
By filling out your email and hitting "Start learning", you'll be redirected to the app where you'll start your learning journey with ISSEN. After a brief onboarding where you share your desired target language and proficiency, you'll be connected to a tutor to have your initial conversation.
The free trial includes 10 minutes of conversation!
How much does it cost?
ISSEN currently costs a discounted $29/month.
Payment is monthly and you can cancel at any time.
What languages can I learn with ISSEN?
You can use ISSEN to practice and learn Afrikaans, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Belarusian, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Cantonese, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Galician, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Mandarin Chinese, Maori, Marathi, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, and Welsh.
How is ISSEN better than other language learning apps?
We set out to redefine what a language learning app can be‚Äînot by building on existing solutions, but by starting with the experience of a human tutor.
ISSEN is a true language tutor, accessible anytime from your computer or phone. Conversations can be as structured or open-ended as you like‚Äîdive into focused grammar lessons or have a casual chat about your day. Over time, you build a relationship with your AI tutor, which means that as they get to know you, they tailor conversations and lesson plans to your needs‚Äìbut will never judge you when you make a mistake! Plus, our AI tutors are deeply multi-lingual, so if you are a Danish/Mandarin Chinese native looking to learn Gujarati, ISSEN is the app for you.
Our mission is to transform language learning by delivering the connection, effectiveness, and fun that, until now, only human teachers could offer.
How can I start using ISSEN?
By filling out your email and hitting "Start learning", you'll be redirected to the app where you'll start your learning journey with ISSEN. After a brief onboarding where you share your desired target language and proficiency, you'll be connected to a tutor to have your initial conversation.
The free trial includes 10 minutes of conversation!
How much does it cost?
ISSEN currently costs a discounted $29/month.
Payment is monthly and you can cancel at any time.

### Conversational
Engage in natural back-and-forth dialogue that builds fluency. Your tutor is multilingual, understanding and speaking both your native language and the language you‚Äôre learning on the app.

### Flexible Learning Structure
From diving into focused grammar lessons to having a casual conversation about your day, your tutor adapts to your interests and understands your learning style over time.
From diving into focused grammar lessons to having a casual conversation about your day, your tutor adapts to your interests and understands your learning style over time.

You can learn wherever you are. Traveling or at home? Your tutor is available 24/7, tailoring every session to your needs and schedule.

### Learn More
## Frequently Asked Questions
What languages can I learn with ISSEN?
You can use ISSEN to practice and learn Afrikaans, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Belarusian, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Cantonese, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Galician, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Mandarin Chinese, Maori, Marathi, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, and Welsh.
How is ISSEN better than other language learning apps?
We set out to redefine what a language learning app can be‚Äînot by building on existing solutions, but by starting with the experience of a human tutor.
ISSEN is a true language tutor, accessible anytime from your computer or phone. Conversations can be as structured or open-ended as you like‚Äîdive into focused grammar lessons or have a casual chat about your day. Over time, you build a relationship with your AI tutor, which means that as they get to know you, they tailor conversations and lesson plans to your needs‚Äìbut will never judge you when you make a mistake! Plus, our AI tutors are deeply multi-lingual, so if you are a Danish/Mandarin Chinese native looking to learn Gujarati, ISSEN is the app for you.
Our mission is to transform language learning by delivering the connection, effectiveness, and fun that, until now, only human teachers could offer.
How can I start using ISSEN?
By filling out your email and hitting "Start learning", you'll be redirected to the app where you'll start your learning journey with ISSEN. After a brief onboarding where you share your desired target language and proficiency, you'll be connected to a tutor to have your initial conversation.
The free trial includes 10 minutes of conversation!
How much does it cost?
ISSEN currently costs a discounted $29/month.
Payment is monthly and you can cancel at any time.
What languages can I learn with ISSEN?
You can use ISSEN to practice and learn Afrikaans, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Belarusian, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Cantonese, Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Galician, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Mandarin Chinese, Maori, Marathi, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, and Welsh.

We set out to redefine what a language learning app can be‚Äînot by building on existing solutions, but by starting with the experience of a human tutor.
ISSEN is a true language tutor, accessible anytime from your computer or phone. Conversations can be as structured or open-ended as you like‚Äîdive into focused grammar lessons or have a casual chat about your day. Over time, you build a relationship with your AI tutor, which means that as they get to know you, they tailor conversations and lesson plans to your needs‚Äìbut will never judge you when you make a mistake! Plus, our AI tutors are deeply multi-lingual, so if you are a Danish/Mandarin Chinese native looking to learn Gujarati, ISSEN is the app for you.
Our mission is to transform language learning by delivering the connection, effectiveness, and fun that, until now, only human teachers could offer.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: ISSEN

- **Name:** ISSEN
- **Founded:** 2024
- **Location:** New York, NY
- **Team Size:** 2
- **Y Combinator Batch:** F24
- **Group Partner:** Dalton Caldwell
- **Website:** [issen.com](https://issen.com)
- **Tags:** Education, Generative AI, Consumer, AI, New York

### Mission
ISSEN aims to be your personal AI companion for language learning, providing a real-time voice tutoring experience. It‚Äôs designed to help users achieve fluency by adapting lessons to their individual learning styles and preferences. Think of it as a personal tutor that's available 24/7.

### Product Offering
ISSEN offers an AI-driven language learning app that creates a conversational environment similar to interacting with a human tutor. Users can engage in real-time dialogues, where the AI listens and responds, adjusting the conversation based on the user‚Äôs interests and learning goals. The key features include:

- **Conversational Learning:** Engage in natural back-and-forth dialogue.
- **Adaptive Tutoring:** The AI adjusts to your proficiency and learning style over time.
- **Flexible Learning Structure:** Switch between structured lessons and casual chats.
- **24/7 Availability:** Learn anytime, anywhere.

### Languages Offered
ISSEN supports a vast array of languages, from widely spoken ones like Spanish and Mandarin to less common choices like Afrikaans and Welsh. This broad selection means learners can dive into their preferred languages without barriers.

### Customer Experience
Users have praised ISSEN for its effective conversational practice, the realism of the AI interactions, and the personalized pacing of sessions. Testimonials highlight its adaptability and the realistic feel of conversation that helps reduce the pressure often felt in traditional learning settings.

### Pricing
Currently, ISSEN offers its service at a discounted rate of **$29/month**, allowing users the flexibility to cancel at any time. A free trial also gives you 10 minutes to start interacting with your AI tutor.

### Summary
ISSEN is redefining language learning with a focus on personalized interaction and real-time adaptation. Whether you're at home or on the go, this innovative app integrates the strengths of human tutoring into the digital realm contextually and interactively, making language acquisition engaging and effective. If you‚Äôre looking for both a practical and enjoyable way to become fluent, ISSEN might just be your new favorite learning tool. 

---
This summary captures the essence of ISSEN while staying straightforward and engaging, just as one would hope with any start-up aiming to create a meaningful impact in the education sector.
